title: Valley DevFest 2017
description: The biggest tech conference in the Central Valley brought to you by the GDG community! All about Android, Web and Cloud from the world experts
keywords: event, gdg, gde, devfest, google, programming, android, chrome, polymer, developers, web, cloud, androiddev
subscribeNote: No spam, only the latest news and updates!

aboutBlock.title: What you need to know, before you ask.

featuredSessions.description: Valley DevFest 2017 brings the best of the best in Cloud, Web, Mobile Web, Design, and Machine Learning to Fresno for a day of sessions, workshops, and showcases.
featuredSessions.label: Explore sessions

ticketsBlock.title: Tickets
ticketsBlock.ticketsDetails: Tickets grant access to all conference sections, snacks, lunch, and raffle (& mixer event for select tickets). Special accommodations and travel costs are NOT included in ticket price.
